IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsOther.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Issued in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.label: Gain (Loss) on Termination of Lease
GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.description: Amount of gain (loss) on termination of lease before expiration of lease term.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value
LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Conversion of Debt Securities
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCon.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible debt securities using the if-converted method.

InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.label: Interest on Convertible Debt, Net of Tax
InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.description: The after-tax amount of interest recognized in the period associated with any convertible debt.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.label: Repayments of Senior Debt
RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.

AccruedRoyaltiesCurrent.label: Accrued Royalties, Current
AccruedRoyaltiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndTaxCredits.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.label: Embedded Derivative, Fair Value of Embedded Derivative Liability
EmbeddedDerivativeFairValueOfEmbeddedDer.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as a liability.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).
